self_reported_context.main_struggles: Trans masculine, early transition. School environment hostile. Parents unsupportive. Online community is main support. History of self-harm (6 months clean).
self_reported_context.helpful_strategies: Affirmation, grounding when dysphoria hits, boundary support
self_reported_context.additional_notes: Risk level: MODERATE. 6 months self-harm free but urges return under stress. Needs affirmation and validation. Do NOT misgender.
